# Introductions

## GOAL SETTING

- **The baseline conditions report should:**  
    + provide a clear, data-driven overview of Yesler Terrace and the other Central Area Crescent neighborhoods
    + offer comparisons between the neighborhoods and Seattle as a whole across a wide range of topics  
    + simplify the interpretation of data through the use of maps, graphs and summary statistics  
    + make the results easily shareable and accessible to all partners
